Instruction: Sauté garlic in butter until golden, about 2 to 3 minutes.
Stirring constantly, add milk and half-and-half slowly until creamy, about 10 minutes.
Mix in Italian seasoning, pepper, chicken broth, and heavy cream, and stir until the sauce has thickened and is heated through.
Whisk in milk, stirring constantly, until smooth, about 5 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper to taste. Serve over pasta or chicken, and enjoy!
